name: Idle Aquarium: Fish Tank Zoo
description:
Welcome to Idle Aquarium! Build a fin-tastic aquarium brimming with aquatic life and reel in the money!

• Start small
Start with a small exhibit where visitors can see the fish in your collection and use their donations to improve your aquarium!

• Attract guests
Decorate and improve your reception in order to attract more customers and keep them happy through aquatic research and happy marine life. More visitors means more donations for your aquarium!

• Collect fish
Sail away to discover new fish species that you can include in your aquarium exhibits and bring in rarer and legendary fish... is that a Kraken?!

• Upgrade tanks
Buy new fish tanks and improve the existing ones so that you can accommodate even more fish. Adding tank decoration or information stands will make customers even happier, which will translate into more donations!

• Expand
Upgrade your gift shop by adding new sale items or improving the existing ones. You can also add other exhibits rooms to host other species such as otters, penguins or lobsters. Your customers will appreciate it and will spend more money!

Take your aquarium to the next level and become rich!
